title: PM shares ‘more good news for economy’ as overseas remittances go highest ever
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 17 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday said the country’s remittances from overseas Pakistanis reached $2,768 million in July 2020, highest ever amount in one month in the history of Pakistan.
“[This is ] more good news for Pak economy,” the Prime Minister said in a tweet.
The Prime Minister mentioned that this was 12.2 percent increase over June 2020 and 36.5 percent increase over July 2019.
